texts.name: collab details
texts.text:
Hi [[SCRIPT=ToFirstOrLastname]],

Thanks for getting back to us. We're excited about the possibility of partnering with you on **[[INPUT=Âπ≥Âè∞|select|YouTube;Instagram;TikTok]]** showcasing some of our awesome accessories. We propose the following:

## Deliverables

**[[INPUT=‰∫ßÂá∫Êï∞Èáè]]*[[SCRIPT=contentType|output]]** on **[[INPUT=Âπ≥Âè∞]]** showcasing PlayVital products (featuring key benefits, functionality, and personal experience with them).

[[SCRIPT=videoLength]]
## Timeline

Approximately **[[INPUT=‰∫ßÂá∫Êó∂Èó¥]]** after receiving the products.

## Affiliate Program

To make this partnership more rewarding. We'd like to invite you to join our [affiliate program](https://af.uppromote.com/playvital/register?p=175715) ! This means your followers will not only discover awesome products through your reviews, but they'll also get a special **10%** discount using your unique coupon code. Plus, you'll earn a **15%** commission on every sale generated through your referrals!

## Budget

We are offering **[[INPUT=‰ª∑Ê†º]]** commission for this collaboration.

## Payment

We will process the payment via PayPal upon reviewing the demo video.

## Shipping

We are shipping internationally, We will ship the sample cases directly to your address. The estimate time depends on the address.

## Sample Request

You can apply the samples by filling out this [delivery form](https://tally.so/r/mepkZx). We will arrange the shipping for you asap.

---
Let us know if there is any question or concern. Look forward to hearing from you.

Thanks,

texts.name: package arrived
texts.text:
Hi [[SCRIPT=ToFirstOrLastname]],

We noticed that your package has arrived at the destination. Please feel free to pick it up at your convenience.

Let us know if there is any question or concern.

Have a nice day!

Best,

texts.name: interested
texts.text:
Hi [[SCRIPT=ToFirstOrLastname]],

Thank you for reaching out. We would absolutely love to work with you! ü§ó We are primarily interested in promoting our newest arrivals.

## To Get Start...

1. Head to our [official store](https://playvital.com/collections/new-products)
2. Choose your favorite products and copy the URL
3. Fill out the [Delivery Form](https://tally.so/r/n0OyxA)
4. The products will be shipped soon!

## One more thing:

To make this partnership even more rewarding, we'd like to invite you to join our [affiliate program](https://af.uppromote.com/playvital/register?p=175715)!
This means your followers will not only discover awesome products through your reviews, but they'll also get a special **10%** discount using your unique coupon code. Plus, you'll earn a **15%** commission on every sale generated through your referrals!

Let us know if there is any question or concern!

Wishing you all the best‚ò∫

texts.name: not interested
texts.text:
Hi! [[SCRIPT=ToFirstOrLastname]]

Thank you for your support! Unfortunately, we can't provide products at this time due to specific requirements for influencers. You can join our [Affiliate Program](https://af.uppromote.com/playvital/register) for a 10% commission on every order with a unique code for your followers. Thank you for your interest and support! We hope to collaborate in the future. 

Best,

texts.name: brazil
texts.text:
Hi friend,

Thank you for reaching out and for your interest in working with us. Unfortunately, we are unable to provide products for you due to the strict customs policy in Brazil.

Thank you for understanding![[SCRIPT=signature]]

texts.name: social links
texts.text:
Hi [[SCRIPT=ToFirstOrLastname]]

Could you send over links to your social platforms? We will review them and get back to you asap.

best,
